abstract.text: Returns the vertex’s position of this bounding box that’s the farthest in the given direction. This point is commonly known as the support point in collision detection algorithms.

with no conversion.  These include all of the Variant types from Godot (for

Variant objects box various Godot Objects, you create them with one of the
constructors, and you can retrieve the contents using the various extension
constructors that are declared on the various types that are wrapped.
